channel.title: Celia on This is Celia
channel.description: Recent content in Celia on This is Celia

item.title: Movi: movie community, built for movie enthusiasts
item.description: A prototype website design for movie lovers to share ideas and connect with others

item.title: Pitch Jams: a website to crowdfund your ideas
item.description: It was a hackathon project to turn an employer’s idea into a prototype webpage in 2 days. Our 4-member student team won the first place in the program and $1000 in prize money.

item.title: SummerPlanting: an ecommerce-website for plants
item.description: An ecommerce-website for indoor, outdoor plants and plant decorations

item.title: Wonder World: An app icon designed for a children's publisher
item.description: A logo designed for a children’s publisher
